Column.Name: NDB_No
Column.Description: "5-digit Nutrient Databank number that uniquely identifies a food item.If this field is defined as numeric, the leading zero will be lost."

Column.Name: FdGrp_Cd
Column.Description: "4-digit code indicating food group to which a food item belongs"

Column.Name: Shrt_Desc
Column.Description: "60-character abbreviated description of food item. Generated from the .200-character description using abbreviations in Appendix A. If short description is longer than 60 characters, additional abbreviations are made."
